full_text: Knitted hat and wrist-warmers in 1 strand DROPS Melody or 2 strands DROPS Brushed Alpaca Silk. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ See the OSLO CHILL WRIST-WARMERS pattern here ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #oslochillset DROPS Design: Pattern ml-135 Yarn group D WHOLE SET: SIZES : S/M - M/L - L/XL YARN FOR WHOLE SET : DROPS MELODY from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group D) 100-100-100 g colour 04, Grey Or use: DROPS BRUSHED ALPACA SILK from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 75-75-100 g colour 03, Grey KNITTING TENSION : 17 stitches in width and 22 rows in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches within 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches within 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size. HAT : SIZES : S/M - M/L - L/XL Fits head-size: 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm YARN FOR HAT : DROPS MELODY from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group D) 50-100-100 g colour 04, Grey Or use: DROPS BRUSHED ALPACA SILK from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 50-75-75 g colour 03, Grey NEEDLES FOR HAT : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 4.5 MM: Length 40 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 3.5 MM: Length 40 cm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 4.5 MM. The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size.
